job_details.Vacaturetitel: Relocate to Malta GCP Data and ML Engineer
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Build and Run data related cloud infrastructure and software services on GCP.
     * Participate in sharing your skills and/or mentoring a team of engineers.
     * Automate like your life depends on it. Keep out of the console, and where possible build infrastructure and services with Terraform or other IaC tools and if not possible, script for better automation
     * Support the relationships of clients and become a trusted delivery partner.
     * Support your wider Engineering community by assisting other teams, sharing knowledge, debugging problems, contributing code to various projects, and any other things you can think of.
     * GTD Get things done. Use the DevOps approach to Data Engineering to bring capabilities together and ship feature reach projects on time.
     * Develop tools, services, processes, and pipelines where needed which are useful in your daily work
     * Work with DevOps teams and environments on subjects such as MLOps pipelines, performance monitoring, security monitoring, deployment/configuration, continuous integration/build, and data resource creation scripts.
     * Enjoy yourself. Maintain and cultivate the culture of your team

   What they offer
     * Scale, most of their clients are well known global brands, their infrastructure isn't small and usually anything but simple
     * A great team environment, inside and outside of the workplace
     * Very close and advanced alliance relationships with GCP - Work with the product owners directly and help build their roadmap
     * Love of technology and learning about even newer technology to help their clients be successful
     * Paid certifications
     * Flexible and considerate working hours and locations
     * Access to regular training opportunities, attending conferences and certification support is encouraged
     * Working with Google tech which is not publicly available yet

   Microsoft Business Solutions Overview

   Your long-term future is every bit as important to our client as it is to you. Thats why their aim is to give you experiences that will stay with you for a lifetime. Whether its great training and development, mobility opportunities or corporate responsibility volunteering activities youll gain a wealth of experiences on which to build a rewarding career. Our client is a firm that encourages you to be yourself, values your contribution, and inspires you to act as a role model, always focused on doing the right thing for each other, their clients, and their communities.

   This sets out all the different ways youll be rewarded at the firm. Among other things, you can benefit from honest conversations about your career as well as a range of other rewards. In all these ways and more, they have created an environment that can bring out the best in you.

   #Bethechange and #makethechange. Join our clients talented, successful team and make the leap into the future.

   Dont worry, our client knows that relocation can be a challenge, which is why they have an extremely supportive onboarding team to help you throughout this process! - They provide relocation support for you and your family. Our client is looking forward to meeting you and seeing you grow.
job_details.full_text:
Relocate to Malta GCP Data and ML Engineer

* Build and Run data related cloud infrastructure and software services on GCP.
     * Participate in sharing your skills and/or mentoring a team of engineers.
     * Automate like your life depends on it. Keep out of the console, and where possible build infrastructure and services with Terraform or other IaC tools and if not possible, script for better automation
     * Support the relationships of clients and become a trusted delivery partner.
     * Support your wider Engineering community by assisting other teams, sharing knowledge, debugging problems, contributing code to various projects, and any other things you can think of.
     * GTD Get things done. Use the DevOps approach to Data Engineering to bring capabilities together and ship feature reach projects on time.
     * Develop tools, services, processes, and pipelines where needed which are useful in your daily work
     * Work with DevOps teams and environments on subjects such as MLOps pipelines, performance monitoring, security monitoring, deployment/configuration, continuous integration/build, and data resource creation scripts.
     * Enjoy yourself. Maintain and cultivate the culture of your team

   What they offer
     * Scale, most of their clients are well known global brands, their infrastructure isn't small and usually anything but simple
     * A great team environment, inside and outside of the workplace
     * Very close and advanced alliance relationships with GCP - Work with the product owners directly and help build their roadmap
     * Love of technology and learning about even newer technology to help their clients be successful
     * Paid certifications
     * Flexible and considerate working hours and locations
     * Access to regular training opportunities, attending conferences and certification support is encouraged
     * Working with Google tech which is not publicly available yet

   Microsoft Business Solutions Overview

   Your long-term future is every bit as important to our client as it is to you. Thats why their aim is to give you experiences that will stay with you for a lifetime. Whether its great training and development, mobility opportunities or corporate responsibility volunteering activities youll gain a wealth of experiences on which to build a rewarding career. Our client is a firm that encourages you to be yourself, values your contribution, and inspires you to act as a role model, always focused on doing the right thing for each other, their clients, and their communities.

   This sets out all the different ways youll be rewarded at the firm. Among other things, you can benefit from honest conversations about your career as well as a range of other rewards. In all these ways and more, they have created an environment that can bring out the best in you.

   #Bethechange and #makethechange. Join our clients talented, successful team and make the leap into the future.

   Dont worry, our client knows that relocation can be a challenge, which is why they have an extremely supportive onboarding team to help you throughout this process! - They provide relocation support for you and your family. Our client is looking forward to meeting you and seeing you grow.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and running data-related cloud infrastructure and software services, with a strong focus on automation (IaC, scripting), MLOps pipelines, performance monitoring, and deploying/managing data resources. While generative AI is not explicitly mentioned, the core responsibilities align with the 'ML Engineer' profile's focus on data engineering, modeling (implied through 'MLOps pipelines' and 'data resource creation'), and operations engineering (MLOps) within a cloud environment (GCP). The mention of 'MLOps pipelines' and 'DevOps approach to Data Engineering' strongly points towards this profile over a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Build and Run data related cloud infrastructure and software services on GCP' directly relates to building and managing data infrastructure. 'GTD Get things done. Use the DevOps approach to Data Engineering to bring capabilities together and ship feature reach projects on time' also points to data engineering practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Build and Run data related cloud infrastructure and software services on GCP

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop tools, services, processes, and pipelines where needed which are useful in your daily work' indicates the creation of data-related infrastructure and workflows.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop tools, services, processes, and pipelines where needed which are useful in your daily work

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Automate like your life depends on it. Keep out of the console, and where possible build infrastructure and services with Terraform or other IaC tools and if not possible, script for better automation' implies building infrastructure as code and scripting, which are software development practices applied to infrastructure.
job_tasks.phrase: build infrastructure and services with Terraform or other IaC tools and if not possible, script for better automation

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work with DevOps teams and environments on subjects such as MLOps pipelines, performance monitoring, security monitoring, deployment/configuration, continuous integration/build, and data resource creation scripts' explicitly mentions MLOps and related operational tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with DevOps teams and environments on subjects such as MLOps pipelines, performance monitoring, security monitoring, deployment/configuration, continuous integration/build, and data resource creation scripts

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Automate like your life depends on it. Keep out of the console, and where possible build infrastructure and services with Terraform or other IaC tools and if not possible, script for better automation' also relates to automation and infrastructure management, which are key to MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Automate like your life depends on it. Keep out of the console, and where possible build infrastructure and services with Terraform or other IaC tools and if not possible, script for better automation

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Support the relationships of clients and become a trusted delivery partner' indicates a need to understand client needs and deliver solutions accordingly.
job_tasks.phrase: Support the relationships of clients and become a trusted delivery partner

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Participate in sharing your skills and/or mentoring a team of engineers' directly relates to communication and knowledge sharing within a team.
job_tasks.phrase: Participate in sharing your skills and/or mentoring a team of engineers

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Support your wider Engineering community by assisting other teams, sharing knowledge, debugging problems, contributing code to various projects, and any other things you can think of' highlights collaboration and knowledge sharing across teams.
job_tasks.phrase: Support your wider Engineering community by assisting other teams, sharing knowledge, debugging problems, contributing code to various projects, and any other things you can think of

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Love of technology and learning about even newer technology to help their clients be successful' and 'Access to regular training opportunities, attending conferences and certification support is encouraged' points to a strong emphasis on continuous learning and adapting to new technologies.
job_tasks.phrase: Love of technology and learning about even newer technology to help their clients be successful

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Automate like your life depends on it' and 'GTD Get things done' suggest a pragmatic and results-oriented approach to problem-solving through automation and efficient delivery.
job_tasks.phrase: Automate like your life depends on it

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Automate like your life depends on it' and 'GTD Get things done' implies taking initiative and ownership to ensure tasks are completed efficiently and effectively.
